DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating Pharmacokinetics Safety Epratuzumab Japanese Systemic Lupus Erythematosus ( SLE )
DOC.criteria: Positive Antinuclear Antibody ( ANA ) Screening ( Visit 1 ) Current clinical diagnosis Systemic Lupus Erythematosus ( SLE ) American College Rheumatology ( ACR ) criterion Active moderate severe SLE activity demonstrate British Isles Lupus Assessment Group Index ( BILAG ) Active moderate severe SLE disease demonstrate Systemic Lupus Erythematosus Disease Activity Index ( SLEDAI ) total score stable SLE treatment Subjects breastfeeding , pregnant , plan become pregnant Subjects active , severe SLE disease activity involve renal system active , severe , neuropsychiatric SLE , define neuropsychiatric element score BILAG level A Serious infection
